entity.name: Hillary Clinton
entity.description: Former First Lady of the United States Hillary Clinton

text:
@realDonaldTrump Hillary isn’t going to prison. There is no ObamaGate. There is no border wall. There is no migrant, terrorist caravan. Beautiful healthcare didn’t arrive. North Korea still has nuclear weapons. The tax cut was for the rich. The coronavirus didn’t go down to zero. 
He is a fraud.
